title: Reading and using graphical data for calculations

content.description: Directions: Select the choice that best fits each statement. The following question(s) refer to the figure below, which depicts the observed relation between dietary fat intake and rate of death from breast cancer in different countries.
content.question: United States residents are how many times more likely to die from breast cancer than residents of Hungary?

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Calculate an accurate numeric answer with appropriate units.
